verses.name: 1 Samuel 10:13
verses.text: And when he had made an end of prophesying, he came to the high place.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 10:14
verses.text: And Saul’s uncle said unto him and to his servant, Whither went ye? And he said, To seek the asses: and when we saw that they were no where, we came to Samuel.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 10:15
verses.text: And Saul’s uncle said, Tell me, I pray thee, what Samuel said unto you.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 10:16
verses.text: And Saul said unto his uncle, He told us plainly that the asses were found. But of the matter of the kingdom, whereof Samuel spake, he told him not.
